## Introduction

```{r}
load("./data/2_seqtab.nochim.identifier.Rdata")
load("./data/2_taxa.species.rds")
sampleData <- read_excel("./data/1_sampleData.xlsx")
sampleData <- column_to_rownames(sampleData, "ini_month_id")
seqtab.nochim <- select(seqtab.nochim.identifier, -c("sample_name"))
```


Create phyloseq object
```{r}
asvTable <- otu_table(seqtab.nochim, taxa_are_rows = FALSE)
sampleData <- sample_data(sampleData)
taxoTable <- tax_table(taxa.species)
phyloData <- phyloseq(asvTable,sampleData, taxoTable)

```
